oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Das Bundesprogramm Ökologischer Landbau Bisherige Entwicklung und Perspektiven
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Saggau, Dr. Elke
Baranek, Dr. Elke
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of the Federal Organic Farming Scheme (BÖL) is to strengthen and to enhance the area of organic food and farming. An important part of this is the support of research and development and the dissemination of the results. Since the beginning of the Federal Organic Scheme in 2001 more than 500 praxis oriented research and development projects have been funded. The BÖL will be continued until 2010 with an option until 2015.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Saggau, Dr. Elke and Baranek, Dr. Elke (2009) Das Bundesprogramm Ökologischer Landbau Bisherige Entwicklung und Perspektiven. Paper at: 10. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Zürich, 11.-13. Februar 2009.
